DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomized comparative effectiveness trial designed to compare fixed dosing and weight-based dosing of corticosteroids in patients with Crohn's disease flares.
DOC.brief_title: Corticosteroid Dosage for Crohn's Disease Flare
DOC.detailed_description: - Determine if weight-based corticosteroid (1mg/kg daily) induces remission at a greater rate than fixed corticosteroid dosage. - Determine if weight-based corticosteroid is associated with greater rate of adverse events than fixed corticosteroid dosage.
